name: Cryo Samachurl
description:
A wizened, mumbling hilichurl, one that calls upon the bite of Cryo.
Hilichurls especially gifted in commanding the elements who often reach the zenith of their skill in their twilight years. These shamans remember the frosty chants and are even more skilled in the art of using them to entrap their foes.

investigation.name: Samachurl
investigation.description: Shamans of the hilichurl tribes. They display a limited ability to harness elemental energy.\n"While their masks are made with the intent of instilling fear in their enemies, their designs come across as more charming than frightening." â€” Jacob Musk
